history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER the waterfont
TTS Okay, leaving from the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER 7 A.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 07:00 am.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 55 minutes, and you will take 2 busses..
Walk for about 3 mins to Amity St opposite Target Dr..
Take the 64 ,to Shady avenue at Fifth avenue NS. It will depart at 7:16am..
Walk for about 1 min to Fifth avenue at Shady avenue..
Take the 28X ,to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 7:46am..
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes, yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes, I would.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
